input.sentences: we are starting our tour of diverse architecture .
some structures are plain with a few arches for embellishment .
now it is time to view the mall and its interior design .
sometimes the hangings look like giant christmas ornaments .
you can never tell what is inside a building when you look at the outside .
output.sentences: I took a tour of some buildings in town and thought we were starting with the least diverse.
The first structures were plain with no embellishment.
But we stepped inside one and saw the view of a life time inside the mall.
Its ornaments and hangings were giant.
The inside of this building was way better than it let on from the outside.
